name: Clash Survival: Shooting Games
description:
This is the best game for the fans of strategy games!
You will experience the most epic battles with many weapons of your choice. The concept of the game is very simple. Use the power of physic laws to control the direction of the weapons that you use in order to bit the opponent on the other side.

Game features:

- Simple game controls.
- Amazing graphics and music in the background.
- Many weapons to choose like axe, bow,gun and many more

Download the game today for FREE and star SHOOTING to get the high score!
